mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL( max( tfd.uuid), 0 ) FROM tb_finance_detail tfd WHERE tfd.delete_flag = 0

SELECT tfd.id, tfd.uuid, tfd.item_id AS itemId, tfd.cost_money AS costMoney, tfd.note, tdf.cost_type as costType, tfd.created_by AS createdBy, tfd.created_time AS createdTime, tfd.updated_by AS updatedBy, tfd.updated_time AS updatedTime, tfd.reversion, tfd.delete_flag as deleteFlag FROM tb_finance_detail tfd where tfd.id = #{id}

SELECT tfd.id, tfd.uuid, tfd.item_id AS itemId, tfd.cost_money AS costMoney, tdf.cost_type as costType, tfd.note, tfd.created_by AS createdBy, tfd.created_time AS createdTime, tfd.updated_by AS updatedBy, tfd.updated_time AS updatedTime, tfd.reversion, tfd.delete_flag as deleteFlag FROM tb_finance_detail tfd where tfd.delete_flag = 0
and tfd.updated_by = #{peopleId}

SELECT tfd.item_id AS itemId, IFNULL( sum( tfd.cost_money ), 0 ) AS costMoney FROM tb_finance_detail tfd WHERE tfd.delete_flag = 0
and tfd.updated_by = #{userId}
and tfd.cost_type = 1
and tfd.cost_type = 2
GROUP BY item_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_finance_detail ( id, uuid, item_id, cost_money, cost_type, note, delete_flag, reversion, created_by, created_time, updated_by, updated_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{uuid}, #{itemId}, #{costMoney}, #{costType}, #{note}, #{deleteFlag}, #{reversion}, #{createdBy}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedBy}, #{updatedTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_finance_detail SET item_id = #{itemId}, cost_money = #{costMoney}, cost_type = #{costType}, note = #{note}, reversion = reversion + 1, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_time = #{updatedTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tb_finance_detail SET delete_flag = #{deleteFlag}, reversion = reversion + 1, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, updated_time = #{updatedTime} WHERE id = #{id} and reversion = #{reversion}
